resources.string: Something went wrong! Please try again or report the error.
There are 3 stop modes, You can select one for each app. Below is more information about each mode -
This mode will stop the app always if the app is running.\n\nChoose this mode for rarely used or distracting background apps to ensure they stay stopped and silent.

This mode will stop the app only if it is running and has not been used for some time (default 3 days).\n\nThis is the preferred mode. The app will stop only after a period of inactivity, balancing battery savings with usability.
This mode will never stop the app.\n\nSelect this mode for essential apps (chat, calling, security) that need continuous, real-time access and notifications.
Frequent force stops may quickly drain your device\'s battery. Restarting a force-stopped app requires a power-intensive cold start.
